lead_paragraph: Cameroon plans to send an additional 2,000 soldiers to its Far North region after three suicide bombings in the past week.

headline.main: Cameroon: Forces to Be Added to Fight Boko Haram in North
headline.print_headline: Cameroon: Forces to Be Added To Fight Boko Haram in North

snippet: Cameroon plans to send an additional 2,000 soldiers to its Far North region after three suicide bombings in the past week.
